description:
Dyad is a free, local, open-source AI app builder

Dyad is a free, local, open-source AI app builder
Dyad v0.32.0 focuses on better debugging and smoother workflows, with a major upgrade to the system messages/logs viewer and long-requested Supabase multi-account support. It also includes performance improvements for long chats, more reliable undo behavior, and new OpenRouter models.Release notes: https://www.dyad.sh/docs/releases/0.32.0
Download it: https://www.dyad.sh/downloadWhat's Changed
- Aggregating logs accross sources and improving logs viewer by @azizmejri1 in #1956
- Message list virtualization by @azizmejri1 in #1993
- Bulk supabase edge function update by @wwwillchen in #2002
- Telemetry for search & replace by @wwwillchen in #2001
- Multi supabase accounts by @wwwillchen in #2014
- Make undo more robust by using sourceCommitHash by @wwwillchen in #2015
- fix: Show Token Usage Requires Double Open (#1947) by @princeaden1 in #1989
- Refactor useSupabase hook to be idiomatic by @wwwillchen in #2017
- Use idiomatic react-query for useProposal by @wwwillchen in #2018
- Add GLM 4.7, remove obsolete free models, add devstral 2 (free) by @wwwillchen in #2019
- refactor usechats and set global stale time by @wwwillchen in #2020
- v0.32 beta by @wwwillchen in #2021
- Setup Claude PR review by @wwwillchen in #2023
- Fix claude review env by @wwwillchen in #2025
- Fix model invalidation by @wwwillchen in #2024
- Fix stale UI by @wwwillchen in #2027
- Showing used model for generated message by @azizmejri1 in #2003
- Windows signing hook: only sign dyad.exe by @wwwillchen in #2030
- Bump electron forge deps by @wwwillchen in #2031
- Use hook module path by @wwwillchen in #2032
- enable debug logging for windows sign by @wwwillchen in #2034
- Get electron forge logs by @wwwillchen in #2035
- Use postMake hook by @wwwillchen in #2036
- Fix playwright comment workflow by @wwwillchen in #2041
- Fix playwright comment & Claude PR workflows by @wwwillchen in #2043
- Add debug logging to Claude PR review workflow by @wwwillchen in #2046
- Use direct username filtering for Claude PR workflow by @wwwillchen in #2048
- Use Claude Code OAuth token for PR review by @wwwillchen in #2051
- Claude settings by @wwwillchen in #2076
- Fixing scrolling behavior in the chat panel by @azizmejri1 in #2040
- bump to v0.32 stable by @wwwillchen in #2087
Full Changelog: https://github.com/dyad-sh/dyad/compare/v0.31.0...v0.32.0
